name: never-ending cycles
description:
use the arrow keys to move.  use the right arrow key (→) to see dialogue. if you're stuck, try any arrow keys/moving any other directions OR put the game in fullscreen, it usually works.

my second ever attempt at bitsy! - did this around... 2019 maybe? it's unfinished, because i wanted a section where you could explore inside the cyclops. decided to post it after finding the html file in a very old folder.

thank you for playing.
